title: When can i log in with one launcher again?
body: I am getting sick of having to re-launch League again to play. It should be one-and-done, like it was regularly. I ask to Riot, what's causing the bug, and when do you guys think you can fix it?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

While I don't know of an ETA, I do know we're [investigating the issue](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/KxOhw3OU-login-issues-on-na) and working to resolve it ASAP.

KateyKhaos, you're my favorite Rioter because you're so active in terms of getting in contact with boards.

Thanks for this update from the playerbase.
